title: Green Pea, Potato &  Goat’s Cheese Frittata &  Goat’s Cheese Frittata
directions: Heat a 7.8-inch (20cm) ovenproof non-stick frying pan over medium heat, greased with the olive oil. Cook the sliced potato 5-6 minutes on each side or until lightly golden and tender. Transfer to a plate and set aside

title: Protein Pancakes
directions: Place all ingredients into a blender or food processor and blitz together until smooth
